name: NO REPORT
description:
In the game "NO REPORT", you must enter an apartment that appears to be normal at first glance, but as you progress, it's true form becomes more apparent. This horror game is a first-person walking simulator with a scary and a tense atmosphere; explore the area, solve puzzles, and find the secret. Frightening things await you along the journey; are you truly prepared to face the consequences?

This is my first game, so please don't be too harsh, since I'm constantly learning and improving. The revenue from the game will be utilized to create even better games, so stay tuned.
The game takes an average of 30 minutes to finish.







  • Immerse yourself in a terrifying ghost story full of suspense and mystery with some great graphics and high quality sound design.
  • Travel around the dark and gloomy house to confront the ghost's tragic past.
  • Solve devious puzzles and riddles to discover the key to survival.
  • Experience heart-pounding moments and a sense of dread that will last long after the game is over.
